name: Ext_R2_DocumentReference_re_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.DocumentReference.relatesTo.code for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.relatesTo.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The type of relationship that this document has with anther document.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.relatesTo.code` maps to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.code`. Has no type mapping `code` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-relationship-type|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The type of relationship that this document has with anther document.
element.comment: `DocumentReference.relatesTo.code` maps to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.code`. Has no type mapping `code` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-relationship-type|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The type of relationship between documents.
